alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 13 at 6:23PM CDT until May 13 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern Adams County in west central Illinois... Southwestern Brown County in west central Illinois... North Central Pike County in west central Illinois... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 623 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Mount Sterling, Clayton, Beverly, Buckhorn, Kingston, Baylis, Mound Station, Kellerville and Fishhook. This includes the following State Parks... Siloam Springs State Park. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
